paper_abstract: This paper deals with the impact study of the choice of conjunctive operator between input variables of TSK fuzzy models, t-norm, on stability domain estimation. The approach is based on stability conditions issued from vector norms corresponding to a vector-Lyapunov function. In particular, for considered second-order TSK models we show that Zadeh's t-norm, logic product min, gives the largest estimation of stability domain. (c) 2007 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Choice of conjunctive operator of TSK fuzzy systems and stability domain study
